title: Population in China 2008 - 2018 , by gender
summary: Overall Population in million inhabitants has increased over the Year.
Population in million inhabitants is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
Maximum Population in million inhabitants, about 708.15 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Population in million inhabitants, of value 700.79 was reported at Year 2014
